issue.title: [C++] Add option to switch between dynamic and static linking in unit test executables
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3025](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3025). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Many test executables do not require static linking. Some others use non-exported APIs. It would improve build times to not statically link if it is not required

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3025?focusedCommentId=16573792) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Hm, the problem with this for Travis CI is that static linking is required for coverage reports. So maybe this won't help us
